_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments:  
value (Any): The value to be converted into translated text
[trueValue="_YES_"] (String): The translated text to be returned if value is true.
[falseValue="_NO_"] (String): The translated text to be returned if value is false.
[useNil=true] (Boolean): Indicates whether an empty string should be returned for undefined or null values
_PAGE_FILTER_BOOLEAN_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterBoolean is used to convert a boolean value into translated text. It allows customization of texts for true and false values, and the option to return an empty string for undefined or null values.
